doc:
Edith Borella https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edith_Borella 0 Edith Borella (November 25, 1890 - March 6, 1974) was an American silent film actress of Swiss descent. She starred in films such as the 1913 film Through the Neighbor's Window with Charlotte Burton which was her debut. Her career only lasted two years between 1913 and 1915 but in that period of time she starred in 46 films. She married popular English-American actor Edward Coxen in 1914. Edith_Borella ( November_25_,_1890 - March_6_,_1974 ) was an_American_silent_film_actress of Swiss_descent . She starred in films such_as the_1913_film Through the_Neighbor 's_Window with Charlotte_Burton which was her debut . Her_career only lasted two_years between 1913_and_1915 but in that_period of time she starred in 46_films . She married popular_English-American_actor_Edward_Coxen in 1914 .
